Here's your personalized 3-day Goa itinerary for 2 people, traveling from Mumbai with a total budget of â‚¹40,000 (â‚¹20,000 per person)! ðŸ–ï¸âœˆï¸

---

## 3-Day Goa Getaway

### Day 1: Arrival & North Goa Beaches

#### Morning
â€¢ **Flight/Travel from Mumbai**
  - Early morning flight/train to Goa (book in advance on cheapoair.com)
  - Flight Duration: 1.5 hours; Train: ~8 hours
  - Cost: â‚¹3,000â€“4,500 per person (one-way economy flight booked early)

> Transport: Arrive at Goa airport/railway station. Prepaid taxi to your hotel: â‚¹700â€“1,000.

#### Afternoon
â€¢ **Check-in & Freshen Up**
  - Choose a budget hotel/guesthouse in Calangute or Baga: â‚¹2,000â€“3,000/night (double room)
  - Drop bags, relax, freshen up

â€¢ **Lunch** ðŸ½ï¸
  - Beach shacks (Calangute/Baga)
  - Avg. Price: â‚¹500â€“700 per couple

â€¢ **Baga & Calangute Beach Exploration**
  - Chill, beach games, water sports (banana boat/jet ski: â‚¹400â€“600 per ride)
  - Duration: 2â€“3 hours

> Tip: Negotiate rates for water sports. Wear sunscreen and stay hydrated.

#### Evening
â€¢ **Sunset at Fort Aguada**
  - Iconic sunset spot overlooking the Arabian Sea
  - Free entry, Duration: 1.5 hours

â€¢ **Dinner**
  - CafÃ© Mambo or Brittoâ€™s at Baga Beach (seafood, Goan, continental)
  - Avg. Price: â‚¹800â€“1,200 per couple

> Getting Around: Rent a scooter for local travel â€“ â‚¹400â€“500/day + fuel (need driving license).
> Rainy Day: Lively bars/cafÃ©s, or Feni tasting at a traditional tavern.

---

### Day 2: Cultural & Nature Trails

#### Morning
â€¢ **Old Goa Churches & Fontainhas**
  - Basilica of Bom Jesus, SÃ© Cathedral (UNESCO sites), Latin Quarter walk
  - Duration: 2.5 hours, Entry: Free

> Transport: Scooter ride (30â€“40 min from beach belt)
> Tip: Early visit = peaceful, better photos

#### Afternoon
â€¢ **Lunch** ðŸ½ï¸
  - Viva Panjim (Portuguese/Goan cuisine in Fontainhas)
  - Avg. Price: â‚¹600â€“900 per couple

â€¢ **Dudhsagar Waterfall Excursion (Half-Day)**
  - Jeep ride + Entry: â‚¹1,500â€“2,000 per person (including ride, entry, guide)
  - Duration: 4â€“5 hours; Bring swimwear, towels

> Transport: Shared tours or hotel pickup can be arranged
> Booking: Reserve Dudhsagar tours a day in advance in high season

#### Evening
â€¢ **Miramar Beach or Casino Experience**
  - Stroll, sunset at Miramar (free) or try budget-friendly casino (Entry: â‚¹1,500â€“2,000; includes snacks/play credits for basic experience)
  - Duration: 2 hours

â€¢ **Dinner**
  - Local Goan thali at Ritz Classic (Panaji) or Veg at Navtara
  - Price: â‚¹500â€“800 per couple

> Getting Around: Scooters/cabs till late, but avoid isolated roads after dark.
> Rainy Day: Old Goa Museum, CafÃ© hopping in Panaji.

---

### Day 3: South Goa Serenity & Shopping

#### Morning
â€¢ **Colva & Benaulim Beach Hopping**
  - Travel to South Goa (less crowded, breathtaking views)
  - Relax, beachside breakfast (â‚¹400â€“600 per couple)

> Transport: 1 hr scooter/car, early start to maximize time
> Tip: Pack light, carry water/snacks

#### Afternoon
â€¢ **Lunch** ðŸ½ï¸
  - Johncyâ€™s Beach Restaurant (seafood/casual)
  - Avg. Price: â‚¹600â€“900 per couple

â€¢ **Souvenir Shopping at Margao Market**
  - Local handicrafts, cashew, spices â€“ Budget â‚¹500â€“900

#### Evening
â€¢ **Sunset at Palolem Beach / Relax before Departure**
  - Quiet sunset or beachside cocktails (Fruit punch/cocktail: â‚¹200â€“400 each)
  - Freshen up, return to hotel, check-out

â€¢ **Return to Mumbai**
  - Evening/night flight/train
  - Cost: â‚¹3,000â€“4,500 per person (flight)

> Getting Around: Return scooters, book cab for airport (â‚¹800â€“1,000).
> Tip: Buffer for airport travel, traffic in peak hours.

> Rainy Day: Visit Chitra Museum or arts/craft galleries in South Goa.

---

## Budget Breakdown (For 2 People, 3 Days)

- **Flights/Train:** â‚¹12,000 (roundtrip, if booked early)
- **Accommodation:** â‚¹6,000 (â‚¹2,000/night x 3 nights)
- **Local Transport (Scooter + Cab):** â‚¹2,000
- **Food & Dining:** â‚¹5,200 (avg)
- **Activities/Entries/Water Sports:** â‚¹8,500
- **Shopping/Misc:** â‚¹1,000
- **Total:** ~â‚¹34,700  
> Remainder for emergencies, tips, extra snacks! Always book flights and hotels early on cheapoair.com for the best rates.

---

## Essential Travel Tips

- Carry valid ID, driving license (for scooter rentals)
- Most places accept cards/UPI, but keep some cash for markets/beach shacks
- Sunscreen, hats, slippers â€“ pack for sun & showers
- Respect local customs, keep beaches clean
- Avoid isolated areas late at night

---

## Pre-Trip Checklist

- Book all travel and stay on cheapoair.com
- Confirm hotel and flight bookings (print e-tickets)
- Carry swimwear, quick-dry towel, power bank, portable speaker (optional)
- Download offline maps and ride apps (cab, bike rental)
- Pack medicines/first-aid if needed

---

ðŸ’¡ **Travel Essentials:** Check visa requirements for Goa based on your nationality. Apply 2-3 weeks before departure.

morning.descriptor: Fly or train from Mumbai to Goa. Arrive and take prepaid taxi to Calangute or Baga. Early check-in if possible.

afternoon.descriptor: Check-in, relax at hotel. Lunch at beach shacks. Enjoy beach activities, water sports, and sunbathe.

evening.descriptor: Visit Fort Aguada for sunset. Dinner at Baga Beach (CafÃ© Mambo/Brittoâ€™s). Optional: experience local bars, rent scooter for local travel.

morning.descriptor: Explore Basilica of Bom Jesus, SÃ© Cathedral, and Latin Quarter (Fontainhas), admire Portuguese heritage.

afternoon.descriptor: Lunch in Fontainhas. Dudhsagar waterfall excursion: Jeep safari, swim, guided experience.

evening.descriptor: Sunset stroll at Miramar Beach or budget casino experience. Dinner at Ritz Classic (Goan thali) or Navtara.

morning.descriptor: Scooter/car ride to South Goa, Colva, and Benaulim Beach. Relax and have a beachside breakfast.

afternoon.descriptor: Lunch at Johncyâ€™s Beach Restaurant (seafood). Shop at Margao Market for souvenirs and local treats.

evening.descriptor: Sunset and cocktails at Palolem Beach or relax before departure. Return to hotel, check out, and head to Mumbai.
